text: @CarolineLucas @BoswellAffleck @SouthernWater @EnvAgency @We_OwnIt My aunt, a civil servant, worked on the original nationalization of the water companies under Richard Crossman. Though she was by no means a red-hot socialist, it broke her heart, soon after her retirement, to see all her work undone by Mrs Thatcher's Tories
